ARABIC: قَالَتْ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَٰمٌ وَلَمْ يَمْسَسْنِى بَشَرٌ وَلَمْ أَكُ بَغِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: She said, 'How can I have a boy when no man has touched me and I am not an unchaste woman?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How can I have a son," she said, "when no man has touched me, nor am I sinful?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Mary said: "How can a boy be born to me when no man has even touched me, nor have I ever been unchaste?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: She said, "How can I have a son when no mortal has touched me nor am I an unchaste woman".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: She said, “How can I bear a son? No man has ever touched me, nor am I of poor conduct!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: She said: "How can I have a son when no man has touched me, nor am I Baghiyya"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: She said: When shall I have a boy and no mortal has yet touched me, nor have I been unchaste?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: She said, 'How shall I have a son whom no mortal has touched, neither have I been unchaste?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: She said: How can I have a son when no mortal hath touched me, neither have I been unchaste?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: She said, "How can I have a son when no man has touched me; and neither have I been unchaste?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: She said: in what wise shall there be a boy unto me, whereas not a human being hath touched me, nor have I been a harlot?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: She said, ‘How shall I have a child seeing that no human being has ever touched me, nor have I been unchaste?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: She said: "How shall I have a son, seeing that no man has touched me, and I am not unchaste?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: She said: "How can I have a son, when no man has touched me, nor am I unchaste?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: How shall I bear a son' she answered, 'when I am not touched by a human and not unchaste'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: She said, “How can I have a son, when no man has touched me, and I was never unchaste?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: She said, "How can I have a boy while no man has touched me and I have not been unchaste?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:20] She said, ‘How shall I have a boy when no human being has [ever] touched me, by way of conjugality, neither have I been unchaste?’, [neither have I been] a fornicator.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (She said) Mary said to Gabriel (pbuh): (How can I have a son when no mortal hath touched me) when no husband has come near me, (neither have I been unchaste) neither have I been an adulteress!
